author: Max Greenwood
title: Republicans ramp up support for candidates snubbed by Trump

sentence: In George, incumbent governor Brian Kemp, whom Trump blames for his loss in 2020, has withstood Trump's attacks and leads handily in recent polls.
author: Keith Naughton
title: For Easter, Trump plays Judas

sentence: Only the Georgia governor's race looks to be trouble, with incumbent governor and Trump bete noire Brian Kemp up 16 points over Trump-endorsed David Perdue.
author: Keith Naughton
title: Ohio win may obscure the mixed bag of Trump's primary strength
